full_summary:
# Riding Mower Tender Notice
## Solicitation Number: WS4031725462

### Purpose
Public Services Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites suppliers to submit bids for the procurement of eleven (11) Riding Mowers with various configurations and attachments for the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC).

### Notice Scope
The solicitation is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-18MOWR/B. Suppliers who wish to become pre-qualified under this RFSA should refer to: https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-653-75734.

### Requirements
The Riding Mowers are to be delivered to various locations within Canada. The deadline for submission is September 6th at 2:00 PM EDT. Bids submitted after this time will be deemed non-responsive.

### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS4031725462
* **Publication Date:** August 17, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 6, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 30, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** November 29, 2024

### Trade Agreements
This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement

### Regions of Opportunity
None specified.

### Regions of Delivery
The Riding Mowers are to be delivered to the following locations:

* Duck Lake
* Drummondville
* Donnacona
* Truro
* Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)
* Abbotsford

### Contact Information
For any questions or clarification regarding this solicitation, please contact:

Philippe Schou
phillipe.schou@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice URL
https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/WS4031725462

###
